mapper.sql: FROM sys_navigator WHERE 1=1 AND delete_mark = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT id,pid,sno,nav_name,nav_code,permission,nav_type,attributes,nav_url,icon_cls,use_mark, create_name,create_time,modify_name,modify_time FROM sys_navigator WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id} AND delete_mark = FALSE

SELECT sys_navigator.id,sys_navigator.pid,sys_navigator.nav_name, IFNULL(sys_permissions.role_id,#{roleId}) as role_id,sys_navigator.nav_type, sys_navigator.icon_cls,IF (ISNULL(sys_permissions.nav_id),0,1) AS checked FROM sys_navigator LEFT JOIN sys_permissions ON (sys_navigator.id = sys_permissions.nav_id AND sys_permissions.role_id = #{roleId}) WHERE sys_navigator.pid = #{pid} AND sys_navigator.delete_mark = FALSE
